A REST controller providing comprehensive device management endpoints for the OpenFrame API v1, supporting device querying, filtering, status updates, and detailed device retrieval with optional tag inclusion.

## Key Components

- **Main Controller**: `DeviceController` - RESTful endpoints for device operations
- **Service Dependencies**: 
  - `DeviceService` - Core device business logic
  - `DeviceFilterService` - Device filtering and search capabilities  
  - `TagService` - Device tag management
- **Key Endpoints**:
  - `GET /api/v1/devices` - Paginated device listing with filters
  - `GET /api/v1/devices/{machineId}` - Individual device retrieval
  - `GET /api/v1/devices/filters` - Available filter options
  - `PATCH /api/v1/devices/{machineId}` - Device status updates
- **Features**: Swagger documentation, pagination, comprehensive filtering, error handling

## Usage Example

```java
// Get paginated devices with filters
@GetMapping
public DevicesResponse getDevices(
    @RequestParam List<DeviceStatus> statuses,
    @RequestParam List<DeviceType> deviceTypes,
    @RequestParam String search,
    @RequestParam(defaultValue = "false") Boolean includeTags,
    @RequestParam(defaultValue = "20") @Min(1) @Max(100) Integer limit
) {
    // Builds filter criteria and queries devices
    // Optionally loads tags for each device
    // Returns paginated response with cursor-based navigation
}

// Update device status
@PatchMapping("/{machineId}")
@ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT)
public void updateDeviceStatus(
    @PathVariable String machineId,
    @RequestBody UpdateDeviceStatusRequest request
) {
    // Updates device status (DELETED/ARCHIVED)
}
```
